exec: *  生成 26 位交易编号：YYYYMMDD bbbbbbbb B AA nnnnnnn
*    2. AA 同时产出 RT、AD 两种 → instructionId_RT / instructionId_AD
*    3. 所有数据均保存为 Collection 变量
// 4) 依次生成 RT 和 AD

{

pm.collectionVariables.set("msgIdSequence", currentSequence); // Store the new sequence number back

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<Message xmlns="urn:bcsis" xmlns:ct="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.008.001.02" xmlns:head="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:head.001.001.01" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:bcsis G3.Real-Time.Credit.Transfer.01.xsd">
    <AppHdr>
        <head:Fr>
            <head:FIId>
                <head:FinInstnId>
                    <head:ClrSysMmbId>
                        <head:MmbId>SACHSGS0XXX</head:MmbId>
                    </head:ClrSysMmbId>
                </head:FinInstnId>
            </head:FIId>
        </head:Fr>
        <head:To>
            <head:FIId>
                <head:FinInstnId>
                    <head:ClrSysMmbId>
                        <head:MmbId>TRBUSGS0XXX</head:MmbId>
                    </head:ClrSysMmbId>
                </head:FinInstnId>
            </head:FIId>
        </head:To>
        <head:BizMsgIdr>B20250722TRBUSGS0BFP1464362</head:BizMsgIdr>
        <head:MsgDefIdr>pacs.008.001.02</head:MsgDefIdr>
        <head:CreDt>2025-07-22T07:15:54Z</head:CreDt>
        <head:Sgntr>
            <Signature xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#">
                <SignedInfo>
                    <CanonicalizationMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315"/>
                    <SignatureMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#rsa-sha256"/>
                    <Reference URI="">
                        <Transforms>
                            <Transform Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#enveloped-signature"/>
                        </Transforms>
                        <DigestMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#sha256"/>
                        <DigestValue>ZdpEfbrd5WtmI5elBDdM5FuC9rb8cekXi0j9Hvzwa0c=</DigestValue>
                    </Reference>
                </SignedInfo>
                <SignatureValue></SignatureValue>
                <KeyInfo>
                    <X509Data>
                        <X509SubjectName>CN=TEST_GC_TRUST_BANK_SG_HSM_01,OU=001,OU=9733,O=Singapore Automated Clearing House,C=SG</X509SubjectName>
                        <X509IssuerSerial>
                            <X509IssuerName>CN=UAT_OCA4,O=Singapore Automated Clearing House,C=SG</X509IssuerName>
                            <X509SerialNumber>2200028474</X509SerialNumber>
                        </X509IssuerSerial>
                    </X509Data>
                </KeyInfo>
            </Signature>
        </head:Sgntr>
    </AppHdr>
    <CreditTransfer>
        <ct:FIToFICstmrCdtTrf>
            <ct:GrpHdr>
                <ct:MsgId>B20250722TRBUSGS0BFP1464362</ct:MsgId>
                <ct:CreDtTm>2025-07-22T15:15:54.874</ct:CreDtTm>
                <ct:NbOfTxs>1</ct:NbOfTxs>
                <ct:TtlIntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy="SGD">9.99</ct:TtlIntrBkSttlmAmt>
                <ct:SttlmInf>
                    <ct:SttlmMtd>CLRG</ct:SttlmMtd>
                    <ct:ClrSys>
                        <ct:Cd>MEP</ct:Cd>
                    </ct:ClrSys>
                </ct:SttlmInf>
            </ct:GrpHdr>
            <ct:CdtTrfTxInf>
                <ct:PmtId>
                    <ct:InstrId>20250722TRBUSGS0BRT1464362</ct:InstrId>
                    <ct:EndToEndId>20250722TRBUSGS0BRT1464362</ct:EndToEndId>
                    <ct:TxId>20250722TRBUSGS0BRT1464362</ct:TxId>
                </ct:PmtId>
                <ct:PmtTpInf>
                    <ct:SvcLvl>
                        <ct:Cd>SDVA</ct:Cd>
                    </ct:SvcLvl>
                </ct:PmtTpInf>
                <ct:IntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy="SGD">9.99</ct:IntrBkSttlmAmt>
                <ct:ChrgBr>SLEV</ct:ChrgBr>
                <ct:InstgAgt>
                    <ct:FinInstnId>
                        <ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                            <ct:MmbId>TRBUSGS0XXX</ct:MmbId>
                        </ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                    </ct:FinInstnId>
                </ct:InstgAgt>
                <ct:InstdAgt>
                    <ct:FinInstnId>
                        <ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                            <ct:MmbId>BKCHSGS0XXX</ct:MmbId>
                        </ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                    </ct:FinInstnId>
                </ct:InstdAgt>
                <ct:Dbtr>
                    <ct:Nm>LIONEL LINWOOD zzdrkmIuXU</ct:Nm>
                </ct:Dbtr>
                <ct:DbtrAcct>
                    <ct:Id>

                        </ct:Othr>

                        <ct:ClrSysMmbId>

                        </ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                    </ct:FinInstnId>
                </ct:DbtrAgt>
                <ct:CdtrAgt>
                    <ct:FinInstnId>
                        <ct:ClrSysMmbId>

                        </ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                    </ct:FinInstnId>
                </ct:CdtrAgt>
                <ct:Cdtr>

                </ct:CdtrAcct>
                <ct:Purp>

                </ct:Purp>

</Message>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Message xmlns:head="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:head.001.001.01" xmlns="urn:bcsis" xmlns:ct="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.008.001.02">
    <AppHdr>
        <head:Fr>
            <head:FIId>
                <head:FinInstnId>

                    </head:ClrSysMmbId>

            </head:FIId>
        </head:Fr>
        <head:To>
            <head:FIId>
                <head:FinInstnId>
                    <head:ClrSysMmbId>
                        <head:MmbId>{{BIC_CODE}}</head:MmbId>
                    </head:ClrSysMmbId>
                </head:FinInstnId>
            </head:FIId>
        </head:To>
        <head:BizMsgIdr>M{{generatedUID}}</head:BizMsgIdr>
        <head:MsgDefIdr>pacs.008.001.02</head:MsgDefIdr>
        <head:CreDt>{{isoTimestampPlus8}}</head:CreDt>
    </AppHdr>
    <CreditTransfer>
        <ct:FIToFICstmrCdtTrf>
            <ct:GrpHdr>
                <ct:MsgId>M{{generatedUID}}</ct:MsgId>
                <ct:CreDtTm>{{isoTimestampPlus8}}</ct:CreDtTm>
                <ct:NbOfTxs>1</ct:NbOfTxs>
                <ct:TtlIntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy = "SGD">50.30</ct:TtlIntrBkSttlmAmt>
                <ct:SttlmInf>
                    <ct:SttlmMtd>CLRG</ct:SttlmMtd>
                    <ct:ClrSys>
                        <ct:Cd>MEP</ct:Cd>
                    </ct:ClrSys>
                </ct:SttlmInf>
            </ct:GrpHdr>
            <ct:CdtTrfTxInf>
                <ct:PmtId>
                    <ct:InstrId>TX{{generatedUID}}</ct:InstrId>
                    <ct:EndToEndId>AAAA100628-123v</ct:EndToEndId>
                    <ct:TxId>TX{{generatedUID}}</ct:TxId>
                    <ct:ClrSysRef>001</ct:ClrSysRef>
                </ct:PmtId>
                <ct:PmtTpInf>
                    <ct:SvcLvl>
                        <ct:Cd>SDVA</ct:Cd>
                    </ct:SvcLvl>
                </ct:PmtTpInf>
                <ct:IntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy = "SGD">50.30</ct:IntrBkSttlmAmt>
                <ct:IntrBkSttlmDt>2011-03-11</ct:IntrBkSttlmDt>
                <ct:ChrgBr>SLEV</ct:ChrgBr>
                <ct:InstgAgt>
                    <ct:FinInstnId>
                        <ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                            <ct:MmbId>BKAASGSGXXX</ct:MmbId>
                        </ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                    </ct:FinInstnId>
                </ct:InstgAgt>
                <ct:InstdAgt>
                    <ct:FinInstnId>
                        <ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                            <ct:MmbId>{{BIC_CODE}}</ct:MmbId>
                        </ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                    </ct:FinInstnId>
                </ct:InstdAgt>
                <ct:Dbtr>
                    <ct:Nm>James</ct:Nm>
                </ct:Dbtr>
                <ct:DbtrAcct>
                    <ct:Id>
                        <ct:Othr>
                            <ct:Id>147166555</ct:Id>
                        </ct:Othr>
                    </ct:Id>
                </ct:DbtrAcct>
                <ct:DbtrAgt>
                    <ct:FinInstnId>
                        <ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                            <ct:MmbId>BKAASGSGXXX</ct:MmbId>
                        </ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                    </ct:FinInstnId>
                </ct:DbtrAgt>
                <ct:CdtrAgt>
                    <ct:FinInstnId>
                        <ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                            <ct:MmbId>{{BIC_CODE}}</ct:MmbId>
                        </ct:ClrSysMmbId>
                    </ct:FinInstnId>
                </ct:CdtrAgt>
                <ct:Cdtr>
                    <ct:Nm>ABC Electronics</ct:Nm>
                </ct:Cdtr>
                <ct:CdtrAcct>
                    <ct:Id>
                        <ct:Othr>
                            <ct:Id>147166500</ct:Id>
                        </ct:Othr>
                    </ct:Id>
                </ct:CdtrAcct>
                <ct:Purp>
                    <ct:Cd>GDSV</ct:Cd>
                </ct:Purp>
                <ct:RmtInf></ct:RmtInf>
            </ct:CdtTrfTxInf>
        </ct:FIToFICstmrCdtTrf>
    </CreditTransfer>
</Message>

response.name: credit transfer

{

request.description:
``` xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Message xmlns:head="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:head.001.001.01" xmlns:p1="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:prxy.001.001.01" xmlns="urn:bcsis" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:bcsis messages.xsd">
    <AppHdr>
        <head:Fr>
            <head:FIId>
                <head:FinInstnId>
                    <head:BICFI>TRBUSGS0XXX</head:BICFI>
                </head:FinInstnId>
            </head:FIId>
        </head:Fr>
        <head:To>
            <head:FIId>
                <head:FinInstnId>
                    <head:BICFI>SACHSGS0XXX</head:BICFI>
                </head:FinInstnId>
            </head:FIId>
        </head:To>
        <head:BizMsgIdr>B20250725TRBUSGS0BFP0010776</head:BizMsgIdr>
        <head:MsgDefIdr>prxy.001.001.01</head:MsgDefIdr>
        <head:CreDt>2025-07-25T09:29:17.554Z</head:CreDt>
    </AppHdr>
    <ProxyRegistration>
        <p1:PrxyRegn>
            <p1:GrpHdr>
                <p1:MsgId>B20250725TRBUSGS0BFP0010776</p1:MsgId>
                <p1:CreDtTm>2025-07-25T17:29:17.554</p1:CreDtTm>
                <p1:MsgSndr>
                    <p1:Agt>
                        <p1:FinInstnId>
                            <p1:BICFI>TRBUSGS0XXX</p1:BICFI>
                        </p1:FinInstnId>
                    </p1:Agt>
                </p1:MsgSndr>
            </p1:GrpHdr>
            <p1:Regn>
                <p1:RegnTp>NEWR</p1:RegnTp>
                <p1:Prxy>
                    <p1:Tp>MSISDN</p1:Tp>
                    <p1:Val>+6592234519</p1:Val>
                </p1:Prxy>
                <p1:PrxyRegn>
                    <p1:DsplNm>Joe</p1:DsplNm>
                    <p1:Agt>
                        <p1:FinInstnId>
                            <p1:BICFI>TRBUSGSGXXX</p1:BICFI>
                        </p1:FinInstnId>
                    </p1:Agt>
                    <p1:Acct>
                        <p1:Id>
                            <p1:Othr>
<p1:Id>123456</p1:Id>
                            </p1:Othr>
                        </p1:Id>
                        <p1:Tp>
                            <p1:Prtry>BANK</p1:Prtry>
                        </p1:Tp>
                        <p1:Nm>Joe's account</p1:Nm>
                    </p1:Acct>
                    <p1:AcctHldr>
                        <p1:Org>
                            <p1:Nm>iASPEC</p1:Nm>
                            <p1:TpOfOrg>
<p1:Prtry>
    <p1:Id>BIZS</p1:Id>
    <p1:Issr>MEP</p1:Issr>
</p1:Prtry>
                            </p1:TpOfOrg>
                        </p1:Org>
                    </p1:AcctHldr>
                    <p1:PreAuthrsd>true</p1:PreAuthrsd>
                    <p1:XbOptOut>Y</p1:XbOptOut>
                </p1:PrxyRegn>
            </p1:Regn>
        </p1:PrxyRegn>
    </ProxyRegistration>
</Message>
 ```

exec: // 1. 从集合变量中获取当前的计数器值
// 2. 尝试将其转换为整数。如果变量不存在或不是数字，则从 0 开始
// 4. 将新的计数器值存回集合变量，供下一次请求使用
// 5. (重要!) 设置一个本次请求要使用的变量，可以包含前缀
//    我们用一个新的变量名 `currentClientReqId` 来存储格式化后的 ID
let prefix = "REQ-"; // 你可以自定义前缀，或者留空
// (可选) 在 Postman Console 中打印，方便调试
console.log("本次请求 ClientReqId 设置为: " + pm.collectionVariables.get("currentClientReqId"));
*  生成 26 位交易编号：YYYYMMDD bbbbbbbb B AA nnnnnnn
*    2. AA 同时产出 RT、AD 两种 → instructionId_RT / instructionId_AD
*    3. 所有数据均保存为 Collection 变量
// 4) 依次生成 RT 和 AD
